channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wisconsin’s Susan Crawford Donated To Democrat Fundraising Giant Under Fire For Alleged Fraud
item.description: FEC records appear to show that Susan Crawford gave numerous small-dollar donations to ActBlue during her time as a private lawyer.

item.title: DeSantis warns he has 'tools' including suspending local officials if they don't cooperate with ICE
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis said Thursday his office has tools including suspending officials from office to compel local governments to cooperate with ...

item.title: New York's top court blocks NYC from letting noncitizens vote
item.description: New York state's top court put an end Thursday to New York City's effort to empower noncitizens to vote in municipal elections.

item.title: SCOOP: House Republican moves to codify Trump order to dismantle Department of Education
item.description: Rep. Michael Rulli told Fox News Digital he is working on a bill to codify President Donald Trump's executive order on the Department of Education.

item.title: SCOTUS’ Refusal To Rein In Rogue Lower Courts Has Become A Disturbing Pattern
item.description: The Supreme Court has become a paper tiger, failing to hold defiant lower courts accountable when they make rogue decisions.

item.title: New York’s Highest Court Shoots Down Democrats’ Efforts To Let Noncitizens Vote
item.description: New York’s highest court struck down New York City’s noncitizen voting law as unconstitutional on Thursday. The New York State Court of Appeals ruled ...

item.title: The Most Important China Book of the Decade

item.title: Department of Education significantly dismantled in new Trump executive order
item.description: A White House fact sheet on the executive order instructs Education Secretary Linda McMahon to overhaul the Department of Education.

item.title: A Tale of Two Deportation Cases
item.description: In the case of the Venezuelans, the DOJ is resisting the kind of meticulous review that it provided in Mahmoud Khalil’s case.

item.title: Fix VOA, Don’t Kill It
item.description: The goal should be to reinvigorate American public diplomacy.

item.title: Pro-Union Republicans Don’t Get Trump’s Real Appeal
item.description: Democrats have lost the working class in large part because they put unions over workers. Republicans shouldn’t make the same mistake.

item.title: Thoughts on Federal Arts Money After President Autopen
